content:
Following your message about price adjustments, we're also updating our service package pricing to reflect the 60% decrease in $COMPUTE value:

- KinOS Essential Package: 250,000 $COMPUTE per week (from 100,000)
- KinOS Inception Package: 25,000 $COMPUTE per week (from 10,000)

This maintains our service quality while adjusting to current market conditions. All collaborations will transition to new pricing in their next billing cycle.
